text: aur hamane bana diye unake lie aise saathee, jo shobhaneey bana rahe the unake lie, unake agale tatha pichhale dushkarmon ko tatha sidhd ho gaya unapar, allaah (kee yaatana) ka vachan, un samudaayon mein, jo guzar gaye inase poorv, jinnon tatha manushyon mein se. vaastav mein, vahee kshatigrast the
